query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Forse semilia miglia di lontano 2 ci ferve l’ora sesta, e questo mondo 3 china già l’ombra quasi al letto piano,
query.error: **English:** 1 Perhaps a thousand miles from here 2 the sixth hour boils, and this world 3 already bends its shadow almost to the level bed,
query.result: 1 Sahasram yojanānām api dureṇa 2 ṣaṣṭhā ghaṭikā vartate, ayam ca lokaḥ 3 chāyayā svayayā śayyāyāḥ samatalaṃ prati nīyate,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 quando ’l mezzo del cielo, a noi profondo, 5 comincia a farsi tal, ch’alcuna stella 6 perde il parere infino a questo fondo;
query.error: **English:** 4 when the middle of the sky, deep to us, 5 begins to turn such that some stars 6 lose their appearance down to this depth;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 e come vien la chiarissima ancella 8 del sol più oltre, così ’l ciel si chiude 9 di vista in vista infino a la più bella.
query.error: **English:** 7 and as the brightest handmaid 8 of the sun comes further, so the sky closes 9 from sight to sight down to the most beautiful.
query.result: 7 yathā ca sūryasya prabhāvatī dāsī 8 atikrāmati, tathā divyam madhyamam 9 darśanāt darśanam prati nirodhyate yāvat suśobhanatamam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Non altrimenti il trïunfo che lude 11 sempre dintorno al punto che mi vinse, 12 parendo inchiuso da quel ch’elli ’nchiude,

query.result: 10 Na anyathā jayaḥ yaḥ krīḍati 11 sadā paritaḥ tasmai bindave yaḥ mam ajayata, 12 iva āvṛtaḥ tena yena sa āvṛṇoti,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 a poco a poco al mio veder si stinse: 14 per che tornar con li occhi a Bëatrice 15 nulla vedere e amor mi costrinse.
query.error: **English:** 13 little by little faded from my sight: 14 so that love and nothing to see compelled me 15 to turn my eyes back to Beatrice.
query.result: 13 krameṇaiva mama darśane vyaramyata: 14 yataḥ pratyāvartanaṃ cakṣuṣoḥ Bēatrice-abhimukham 15 na kiṃcid api draṣṭum śaknoti sma, prema eva ca mama niyojayati sma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Se quanto infino a qui di lei si dice 17 fosse conchiuso tutto in una loda, 18 poca sarebbe a fornir questa vice.
query.error: **English:** 16 If all that has been said of her up to now 17 were to be summed up in a single praise, 18 it would be little to express her worth.
query.result: 16 Yadi yāvatāḥ ayam asyāḥ kathitāḥ, 17 tāḥ sarvāḥ ekaḥ stutiḥ samāpyeta, 18 tadāpi ayam asyāḥ śobhā na pūrṇā bhavet.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 La bellezza ch’io vidi si trasmoda 20 non pur di là da noi, ma certo io credo 21 che solo il suo fattor tutta la goda.
query.error: **English:** 19 The beauty that I saw transcends 20 not only our world, but I believe for certain 21 that only its Maker fully enjoys it.
query.result: 19 Saubhāgyaṃ yad adṛkṣam atiśayate 20 na kevalam asmābhiḥ, api tu niścitam manye 21 yathā kevalam tasya kartā sarvam anubhavati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Da questo passo vinto mi concedo 23 più che già mai da punto di suo tema 24 soprato fosse comico o tragedo:
query.error: **English:** 22 Overcome by this passage, I surrender 23 more than ever before to the point of his theme, 24 whether comic or tragic it may have been considered:
query.result: 22 Anena padena vijitaḥ aham samarpāmi 23 adhikaṃ pūrvaṃ kadācid api tasya vastuviṣayasya binduṃ 24 adhikrtya yadi vā hāsyaṃ vā śokāntam vā abhūt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 ché, come sole in viso che più trema, 26 così lo rimembrar del dolce riso 27 la mente mia da me medesmo scema.
query.error: **English:** 25 for, like the sun on a face that trembles more, 26 so the remembrance of the sweet smile 27 deprives my mind of myself.
query.result: 25 yathā sūryaḥ mukhe yaḥ adhikaṃ kampate, 26 evam madhurahasitasmṛtiḥ 27 mama manaḥ mama eva madhye vināśayati.
